reviews.review_msg: Great guys and really interesting class. Took his Carolingian Civilization class. Recommend!

He is an incredible prof. Take a class with him if you can. In another life he was a comedian and can teach the most boring topic but still keep you engaged, show him you are interested and you can do well.

Amazing Professor! You will not read any document the same once you have taken a class with him. He expects you to think (god forbid!). His classes are a real learning experience. Future courses seem way easier because he teaches you how to read critically. Long term, my grades improved a lot after taking classes with him.
